title: Chicken a la King
ingredients: ['1 medium roast chicken', '1 onion', '2 punnets button mushrooms', '3 cloves garlic, crushed', '3 tablespoons butter, softened', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '1 can cream of mushroom soup', '125ml chicken stock', '1 small carton double cream (optional)', 'salt and pepper to taste']
